channel.title: [Class rework suggestion] Noble/Aristocrat
channel.description:
**Noble(Blue Dragon Social)**
**Passive 1:Royal Blood**
**Passive 2:Disorder**:If you die and no King is alive at the following day, then the selection of the new king will be delayed by one day.
**Day ability 1:Final Accusation(infinite uses)**:If you get executed for treason today, then your target will permanently need one vote less to put up and to execute. .
**Day Ability 2:Declaration of Trust(Infinite uses)** If you get executed for treason today, then everyone who voted to pardon you will be immune from accusations of treason for the next two days. You may use this when accused of treason
**Night Ability 1:Declaration of Distrust(Infinite uses)**:If you die tonight, then the next day starts with your target(it cannot be the King) being on trial for treason. If two nobles die on the same night with different targets then this declaration has no effect.
**Night Ability 2:Royal Distrust(1 use)** If you die tonight, then the next day starts with the King being on trial for treason.
**Aristocrat(Unseen Social)** **Passive 1:Royal Blood**
**Passive 2:Disorder**:If you die and no King is alive at the following day, then the selection of the new king will be delayed by one day.
**Day Ability 1:Spy(2 uses):** You will hear all whispers from and to your target today.
**Night Ability 1:Forge Ancestry(1 use):** Your target will be able to step up as if they had Royal Blood, permanently. They will be notified.
**Night Ability 2:Take Over(1 use):** If the Mastermind agrees, you will be promoted to the Mastermind (without _In the Shadows_) and the former Mastermind will leave the castle. Not usable when the Mastermind is jailed.

item.title: [Class rework suggestion] Noble/Aristocrat
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
Disorder has three reasons for its existance: It can be used by Evils to delay King nominations(making them a valid protection target sometimes!), it gives BD an incentive to not kill them(if delaying King selections is bad for them) and last, but definitely not least because the King selection process would interfere with Declaration of Distrust.
Maybe I have used the wrong words for Declaration of Distrust. I have changed them to make its effect crystal clear.

And yes, of course, these abilities can be used wrongly and negatively affect Blue Dragon- but then again that’s also true about Bulter and Occupy, Hunter and Wolf, Drunk and Debauch…

item.title: [Class rework suggestion] Noble/Aristocrat
item.dc:creator: Fruit
item.description:
I don’t see the point of disorder as it just delays a king really providing no benefit to any faction and just stalling. These day abilitys seem like really conditional day abilitys and can really stuff up BD if a target is choosen wrongly. The Night abilitys can just be easily expressed in your will that you do not trust so and so. The unseen forge ancestry seems pretty unique but again conditional, the target has to of claimed a royal blood class and step up. Take over seems good but conditional. I think the whole idea was that noble was too conditional of a class and needed some more active ability’s.

Read full topic
